title: The Demon Girl's Song
description: More than anything, Andín dal Rovi wants to escape her small town life, helping her father in the store, watching her younger brother prepare to take the place at University she’d longed for.Instead of escape, she gets a thousand-year-old demon stuck in her head, and she loses everything – her home, her family and her country.In the quest to regain her identity, she finds herself racing against time to uncover the secrets of her world – and save it from utter annihilation.
author: Susan Jane Bigelow
